name: Alexander Choban
tagline: Alexander Choban is a IT Professional, Web Developer, Programmer, Server Admin, Star Wars Fan, Car Enthusiast, and Superhero.
body:
# Alexander Choban is a…

## IT Professional, Web Developer, Programmer, Server Admin, Star Wars Fan, Car Enthusiast, and Superhero

I started programming at the age of 12 and I was hooked. I’ve been working full time in the world of IT for 8 years and even longer when including part time work. My experience includes everything from small CMS websites to designing, programming, and implementing custom .NET business management systems. But my talents don’t just stop at the code, I also have experience with databases and project management. If you’d like to know more about my technical skills, check out my Resume.
